The existence of the Youth Employment Se: The expert would have verified whether the program has actually been launched and is currently operational.
Placement of unemployed youth in paid in: The expert would have checked if unemployed youth are indeed being placed in paid internships and if these internships are provided by companies across the country.
Verification of the number of internship: The expert would have assessed the accuracy of the claim regarding the number of internships being offered to unemployed youth.
Verification of the companies involved: The expert would have investigated the involvement of different companies in providing internships to unemployed youth and assessed the authenticity of their participation in the program.
